page.title: 07Transport
page.content: Cars are the most popular transport in{Ryde,}although there are lots of other ways to travel,such as bicycles,trains and{buses,motor cycles {and scooters.}We have{ferries and {hovercraft}to travel over the sea.To drive a{car}you need to pass a{driving {test}and you also have to{insure and {tax the car.}To drive a{motor bike, {all you have to}do is buy it then you put an{L}plate on it to show that you are a{learner.} You have to be{seventeen}years old to drive any of these things.To travel to{Portsmouth}we catch a{train}which takes us up the{pier,}then we get on the{passenger ferry}to {Portsmouth} soon we are going to have new{ {catamarans}which have two hulls, instead of our old{ferries.}
